title: GRACE KARIN Womens 2025 Summer Maxi Dress Sleeveless Floral Spaghetti Strap Smocked Boho Beach Long Dress with Pockets
description: 【Features】This summer maxi dress features ruched bust, smocked waist, floral printed, sleeveless, adjustable spaghetti straps, square neck, lightweight, full Length, high elastic waist, a line, ruffle flowy hemline, pull on closure, two side pockets.

【Fashion Style】 The smocked waist and ruched bust of this flowy summer dress has good stretch to accommodate varying waist and bust sizes, and the playful flowy ruffle hemline is relaxed fit to be a comfy summer dress, it's seriously all that you could want!
【Easy Match】Wear this spaghetti strap maxi dress with a floppy wide-brimmed hat, sunnies, and your favorite slide sandals for an effortlessly chic beach look! A must have in your closet!
【Occasion】This boho dress for women is gorgeous for beach, party, casual, cocktail, homecoming, prom, dating, travel, holiday, prom, concert, wedding, honeymoon, etc.
【Wash Instruction】Machine washable with cold water recommended, do not bleach, do not iron, hang or line to dry.
